word: The redeemed will meet and recognize those whose attention they have directed to the uplifted Saviour. What blessed converse they have with these souls! \93I was a sinner,\94 it will be said, \93without God and without hope in the world, and you came to me and drew my attention to the precious Saviour as my only hope. . . .\94 Others will say, \93I was a heathen in heathen lands. You left your friends and comfortable home and came to teach me how to find Jesus, and believe in Him as the only true God. I demolished my idols, and worshiped God, and now I see Him face to face. I am saved, eternally saved, ever to behold Him whom I love. . . .\94
